markdownRemark.html:
To test useEffect with enzyme, you'll need to use a combination of the react-dom new test util method act with enzyme mount. Shallow rendering does not trigger componentDidMount so that won't work because useEffect gets triggered on componentDidMount.

Have fun coding!
